enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-registration - Reserved for Spanish Studies students.
title: WCAS SPANISH 207-0-20 Spanish for Heritage Speakers

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: For heritage speakers without prior formal training in Spanish. Emphasis on writing, syntax, and formal modes of the language.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Prerequisite: AP 5 on the Spanish Language Exam, or departmental placement
Three class meetings a week
No P/N

subject: SPANISH
